Reference:
Huang FX, Liu XH, Kong P, Fink D, Ju YT, Fang AM, Yu LJ, Li XL, Na CG, 2008. Fluctuation history of the interior East Antarctic ice sheet since mid-Pliocene. Antarctic Science 20, 197-203.

Data comments:
Latitudes and longitudes based on map figures and Google Earth.
Topographic shielding factors assumed to be 1.
26Al standard assumed to be KNSTD.
Sampling year assumed to be 2006.

expage.github.io
